2. InstallationÂ¶

EMotEP source code: Github

To install the pipeline follow these steps:

  1. Clone workflow into working directory

git clone https://github.com/bibionid/EMotEP.git path/to/workdir''
cd path/to/workdir

  1. Edit config and workflow as needed

vim config/config.yaml

  1. Execute workflow, deploy software dependencies via conda

snakemake -n --use-conda

Please report any prombels with installation via the issue tracker
